template: update articles set published_date ='{{payload}}' where article_id  = {{article_id}};

name: contentful tokens and urls
create neurodiem table
template:
--- not tested

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS neurodiem (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   	article_id INT NOT NULL,
	doi INT,
	contentful string DEFAULT "queued"
	authors string DEFAULT NULL
	journals string DEFAULT NULL
	cf_authors_ids string DEFAULT NULL
	cf_journals_ids string DEFAULT NULL);

name: fetch all articles from gregoryDB, insert into SQLite
get all articles
template: select article_id,doi from articles;

name: insert articles into neurodiemSQLite
template:
insert into neurodiem (article_id,doi)
values ({{payload.article_id}},"{{{payload.doi}}}");

name: flow to keep databases in sync (READY)
select article_id
template: select article_id from neurodiem order by article_id desc;

name: insert articles into neurodiemSQLite
template:
insert into neurodiem (article_id,doi,title,summary, authors, journal, takeaways)
values ({{payload.article_id}},"{{{payload.doi}}}","{{payload.title}}", "{{payload.summary}}",json('{{{payload.authors}}}'), "{{payload.container_title}}", "{{payload.takeaways}}");

select 
    "public"."articles"."article_id" AS "article_id",
	"public"."articles"."title" AS "title",
	"public"."articles"."summary" AS "summary",
	"public"."articles"."link" AS "link",
	"public"."articles"."published_date" AS "published_date",
	"public"."articles"."source" AS "source",
	"public"."articles"."relevant" AS "relevant",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_gnb" AS "ml_prediction_gnb",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_lr" AS "ml_prediction_lr",
	"public"."articles"."discovery_date" AS "discovery_date",
	"public"."articles"."noun_phrases" AS "noun_phrases",
	"public"."articles"."doi" AS "doi",
	"public"."articles"."access" AS "access",
	"public"."articles"."kind" AS "kind",
	"public"."articles"."publisher" AS "publisher",
	"public"."articles"."container_title" AS "container_title",
	json_agg("Authors") as authors
from articles
	LEFT JOIN "public"."articles_authors" "Articles Authors" ON "public"."articles"."article_id" = "Articles Authors"."articles_id"
	LEFT JOIN "public"."authors" "Authors" ON "Articles Authors"."authors_id" = "Authors"."author_id"
where article_id not in (
		{{ #payload}}{{article_id}},{{/payload}} 0)
and access = 'open'
and takeaways is not null
		group by "article_id"
		order by "article_id" desc
;

select
	"public"."articles"."article_id" AS "article_id",
	"public"."articles"."title" AS "title",
	"public"."articles"."summary" AS "summary",
	"public"."articles"."link" AS "link",
	"public"."articles"."published_date" AS "published_date",
	"public"."articles"."source" AS "source",
	"public"."articles"."relevant" AS "relevant",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_gnb" AS "ml_prediction_gnb",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_lr" AS "ml_prediction_lr",
	"public"."articles"."discovery_date" AS "discovery_date",
	"public"."articles"."noun_phrases" AS "noun_phrases",
	"public"."articles"."doi" AS "doi",
	"public"."articles"."access" AS "access",
	"public"."articles"."kind" AS "kind",
	"public"."articles"."publisher" AS "publisher",
	"public"."articles"."container_title" AS "container_title",
	"public"."articles"."takeaways" as "takeaways",
	json_agg("Authors") as authors
from articles
	LEFT JOIN "public"."articles_authors" "Articles Authors" ON "public"."articles"."article_id" = "Articles Authors"."articles_id"
	LEFT JOIN "public"."authors" "Authors" ON "Articles Authors"."authors_id" = "Authors"."author_id"
where article_id not in (0)
	and access = 'open'
	and takeaways is not null
	group by "article_id"
	order by "article_id" desc
;

name: add authors column
template:
ALTER TABLE neurodiem
  ADD authors NULL;

name: query table limit 10
template: select * from neurodiem limit 10;

name: add cf_authors_ids column
template:
ALTER TABLE neurodiem
  ADD cf_authors_ids NULL;

topic: update neurodiem set cf_authors_ids = NULL where cf_authors_ids = '[""]';

name: add journal column
add columns
template:
ALTER TABLE neurodiem
  ADD summary NULL;

name: get articles where cf_journals_ids is null
template:
select article_id,journal
from neurodiem
where cf_journals_ids is null and journal is not null
or cf_journals_ids = ""
-- where article_id = 1067000
order by article_id desc
limit 1;

build slug field + compose contentFul url

template: select * from neurodiem where mla is NULL limit 500;
update neurodiem set mla = "{{payload}}" where article_id = {{article_id}};

name: get author matching first name and last name
get articles where cf_authors_ids is null
template:
select article_id,
	authors
from neurodiem
where cf_authors_ids is null
or cf_authors_ids = '[""]'
order by article_id desc
limit 1;

name: send to contentFul

template:
update neurodiem set cf_authors_ids = json('[{{#payload}}{{#items}}"{{sys.id}}",{{/items}}{{/payload}}""]')
where article_id = {{article_id}};

topic: update neurodiem set contentful = "queued" where article_id = 1059257;

name: get entries matching content type fal-gregory-ai
update sqlite database with success
template:
UPDATE
	neurodiem
SET
	contentful = 'success'
WHERE
	article_id = {{article_id}}

name: select new batch from neurodiemSQLite
template:
select *
from neurodiem
where contentful = 'queued'
and cf_authors_ids is not null
and cf_journals_ids is not null
and cf_authors_ids != '[""]'
and mla is not null
and takeaways is not null
order by article_id desc
limit 1;

name: generate contentful payload
clear cf_authors_ids that are empty
topic: update neurodiem set cf_authors_ids = NULL where cf_authors_ids = '[""]';

query: update articles set doi = ? where article_id = ?;

rules.to: select article_id,link from articles where doi IS NULL order by article_id desc;
SELECT   doi,   count(*) FROM articles GROUP BY   doi HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT   doi,   count(*) FROM articles GROUP BY   doi HAVING count(*) > 1;

query:
DELETE FROM articles_authors WHERE articles_id = ?;
DELETE FROM articles WHERE article_id = ?;

rules.to: SELECT   article_id,link,doi FROM articles where summary is null limit 1;

query: update articles set summary = ? where article_id = ?;

template: select * from articles where relevant IS NULL order by article_id desc limit 1 ;

name: function 1

template:
select article_id,doi,journal,title,summary,takeaways,mla,cf_authors_ids,cf_journals_ids


from neurodiem
where journal is not null and summary is not null and mla is not null and title is not null and takeaways is not null and takeaways <> ""
limit 100;

name: write status for mastodon
recreate articles table

sql: select article_id from articles order by article_id desc;

template:
select
	"public"."articles"."article_id" AS "article_id",
	"public"."articles"."title" AS "title",
	"public"."articles"."summary" AS "summary",
	"public"."articles"."link" AS "link",
	"public"."articles"."published_date" AS "published_date",
	"public"."articles"."source" AS "source",
	"public"."articles"."relevant" AS "relevant",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_gnb" AS "ml_prediction_gnb",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_lr" AS "ml_prediction_lr",
	"public"."articles"."discovery_date" AS "discovery_date",
	"public"."articles"."noun_phrases" AS "noun_phrases",
	"public"."articles"."doi" AS "doi",
	"public"."articles"."access" AS "access",
	"public"."articles"."kind" AS "kind",
	"public"."articles"."publisher" AS "publisher",
	"public"."articles"."container_title" AS "container_title",
	"public"."articles"."takeaways" as "takeaways",
	json_agg("Authors") as authors
from articles
	LEFT JOIN "public"."articles_authors" "Articles Authors" ON "public"."articles"."article_id" = "Articles Authors"."articles_id"
	LEFT JOIN "public"."authors" "Authors" ON "Articles Authors"."authors_id" = "Authors"."author_id"
where article_id not in (0)
	and takeaways is not null
	and (relevant = true or ml_prediction_gnb = true)
	group by "article_id"
	order by "article_id" desc
;

select 
    "public"."articles"."article_id" AS "article_id",
	"public"."articles"."title" AS "title",
	"public"."articles"."summary" AS "summary",
	"public"."articles"."link" AS "link",
	"public"."articles"."published_date" AS "published_date",
	"public"."articles"."source" AS "source",
	"public"."articles"."relevant" AS "relevant",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_gnb" AS "ml_prediction_gnb",
	"public"."articles"."ml_prediction_lr" AS "ml_prediction_lr",
	"public"."articles"."discovery_date" AS "discovery_date",
	"public"."articles"."noun_phrases" AS "noun_phrases",
	"public"."articles"."doi" AS "doi",
	"public"."articles"."access" AS "access",
	"public"."articles"."kind" AS "kind",
	"public"."articles"."publisher" AS "publisher",
	"public"."articles"."container_title" AS "container_title",
	json_agg("Authors") as authors
from articles
	LEFT JOIN "public"."articles_authors" "Articles Authors" ON "public"."articles"."article_id" = "Articles Authors"."articles_id"
	LEFT JOIN "public"."authors" "Authors" ON "Articles Authors"."authors_id" = "Authors"."author_id"
where article_id not in (
		{{ #payload}}{{article_id}},{{/payload}} 0)
and takeaways is not null
and (relevant = true or ml_prediction_gnb = true)
		group by "article_id"
		order by "article_id" desc
;

name: insert articles into mastodonSQLITE
template:
insert into articles (article_id,link,title, takeaways, sent)
values ({{payload.article_id}},"{{{payload.link}}}","{{payload.title}}","{{payload.takeaways}}",false);

sql: select * from articles where sent = False order by article_id desc limit 1;
name: example last row unsent

sql:
SELECT article_id, title, link, takeaways, sent
FROM articles
WHERE sent = false
ORDER BY article_id DESC
LIMIT 1;

name: create update statement
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE articles SET sent = true WHERE article_id =" + msg.article_id + ";"
return msg;

sql: select count(*) from articles where sent = true ;
name: count sent

sql: select count(*) from articles where sent = false ;

sql: select trial_id from trials order by trial_id desc;

template:
select
	*
from trials

where trial_id not in (0)
	order by "trial_id" desc
;

select 
    *
from trials
	
where trial_id not in (
		{{ #payload}}{{trial_id}},{{/payload}} 0)

		order by "trial_id" desc
;

name: insert trials into mastodonSQLITE
template:
insert into trials (trial_id,link,title, sent)
values ({{payload.trial_id}},"{{{payload.link}}}","{{payload.title}}",false);

sql: select * from trials where sent = true order by trial_id desc limit 1;
name: example last row sent

sql:
SELECT trial_id, title, link, sent
FROM trials
WHERE sent = false
ORDER BY trial_id DESC
LIMIT 1;

name: create update statement
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE trials SET sent = true WHERE trial_id =" + msg.trial_id + ";"
return msg;

sql: select count(*) from trials where sent = false ;
name: count unsent

sql: update trials set sent = 1 where sent = 0 or sent = NULL

    value_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    amount REAL,
    currency TEXT,
    accounting_balance REAL
);
